column4: its very likely its os-prober seeing some rescue partition or the windows 7 boot partition. I would just ignore it. and not worry about it

i installed it.. it dident work.. so i went back to grub2..

worse case.. system wont boot..

yep. live cd, chroot in, reinstall grub2 or somthing like that.
you would have to remove burg i imagine.. and reinstall grub2.. i dont recall how i did it
